paragraph.paragraph:
The EiffelVision2 Window item is a new Eiffel Class,
TITLED_WINDOW that represents a EiffelVision 2 titled window, inheriting
EV_TITLED_WINDOW .
Default feature clauses are contained within the class text, and three pre-defined features are contained:

list.item:
i
nitialize - Redefined from
EV_TITLED_WINDOW , this feature performs the initialization of the window, and any custom initialization required for your window, can be added here.
intialize is executed as a result of calling
default_create on the window.
is_in_default_state - Is the window in the correct default state after initialization? If you wish to check the default state of your window, add code to perform this here.

close_requested - Destroys the window. Connected to the close_request_actions of the window during intialize. The close_request_actions are fired when a user attempts to close the window, and if you wish to override the default behaviour, add your code to this feature.
